text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Hey Ronna, he was also President when most of those jobs were lost due to the COVID-19 shutdowns.
Many of those “gains” will be lost again this month as states that rushed to reopen too early are experiencing Covid surging again and are backing down on reopening.
